description:
Raska, the beloved spokesperson for RobixCorp, is in Bubble Town shooting a commercial for the new Delishix. The Botties sneak onto the set and Raska thinks Connor would be the perfect star for the commercial and chooses his house as the perfect set. Unfortunately, Delishix is not the perfect robot for the ad and he causes problems on the set. Dr. K shows up as his search for Solex heats up.
Source: bcdb.com
